talk.author: did:plc:vw4e7blkwzdokanwp24k3igr
talk.utter: It works exactly the way they say it does. It prevents the Bluesky(tm) app from showing your posts to logged-out users.

talk.author: did:plc:ukihumghispzc6cqrupe5qct
talk.utter:
So there’s still a way for logged out users to maybe see my profile and posts, right?

Because that’s what this implies:
“Bluesky will not show your profile and posts to logged-out users. Other apps may not honor this request.”

talk.author: did:plc:vw4e7blkwzdokanwp24k3igr
talk.utter: Right. All your posts have always been public, this doesn’t change that. But it does mean that they won’t be any *more* accessible than they’ve always been.

talk.author: did:plc:vw4e7blkwzdokanwp24k3igr
talk.utter: Right. All your posts have always been public, this doesn’t change that. But it does mean that they won’t be any *more* accessible than they’ve always been.

talk.author: did:plc:ukihumghispzc6cqrupe5qct
talk.utter: Pubic to logged in users, yes

talk.author: did:plc:vw4e7blkwzdokanwp24k3igr
talk.utter: No, all of your posts have always been public to unauthenticated users, they just have to know how to get them. Which is annoying enough that it hasn’t really hit the mainstream

talk.author: did:plc:vw4e7blkwzdokanwp24k3igr
talk.utter: No, all of your posts have always been public to unauthenticated users, they just have to know how to get them. Which is annoying enough that it hasn’t really hit the mainstream

talk.author: did:plc:ukihumghispzc6cqrupe5qct
talk.utter:
So now they have to know how to get the non publicly visible posts and ignore the polite request?

This keeps getting worse

talk.author: did:plc:vw4e7blkwzdokanwp24k3igr
talk.utter: All of your posts have always been public. There have been apps that show posts to unauthenticated users for months
